name: notion-api
description: Interact with the Notion API to manage pages, databases, blocks, and search across workspaces. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: notion_api
toolDefinition.description: Interact with the Notion API to get/create/update pages, search the workspace, get/query databases, and get block children. Layer 1 skill using provider client for API access (BYOK).

action.description: get_page (retrieve a page), create_page (create a new page), update_page (update page properties), search (search workspace), get_database (get database details), query_database (query database entries), get_block_children (get child blocks)

pageId.description: UUID of the Notion page. Required for get_page and update_page.

parentId.description: UUID of the parent page or database. Required for create_page.

title.description: Page title (max 2000 chars). Required for create_page.

content.description: Optional text content for the page body. Used with create_page.

parentType.description: Type of parent (default: page). Used with create_page.

properties.description: Properties object to update. Required for update_page.

query.description: Search query string (max 500 chars). Required for search.

filter.description: Filter results by type: page or database. Optional for search. Object filter for query_database.

sort.description: Sort by timestamp (default: last_edited_time). Used with search.

limit.description: Number of results to return (1-100). Defaults vary by action.

databaseId.description: UUID of the Notion database. Required for get_database and query_database.

sorts.description: Array of sort objects for query_database.

blockId.description: UUID of the block. Required for get_block_children.
